text: Maria Antonieta de Farias Portocarrero (August 23, 1922 – March 3, 2018), known professionally as Tônia Carrero, was a Brazilian actress.Prestes a fazer 91 anos, Tônia Carrero está lúcida, mas quase não fala e vive reclusa She was born in Rio de Janeiro. She was known for her movie role in Tico-Tico no Fubá and for her television roles in Água Viva and in Louco Amor. She was awarded with Prêmio Saci. Carrero died in Rio de Janeiro on March 3, 2018 of post- surgery cardiac arrest at the age of 95.Atriz Tônia Carrero morre aos 95 anos ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
title: Tônia Carrero
